import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ClientesService, Cliente } from '../clientes.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-citas-reg', templateUrl: './citas-reg.component.html', styleUrls: ['./citas-reg.component.css'] }) export class CitasRegComponent implements OnInit{ clientes!: Cliente[] | undefined; constructor(private clientesService: ClientesService) { } ngOnInit() { this.clientes = this.clientesService.getClientes(); } }
